custom-sql.sql: SELECT Lims_Settings.sid AS sid, Lims_Settings.userId AS userId, Lims_Settings.presence AS presence, Lims_Settings.presenceUpdatedAt AS presenceUpdatedAt, Lims_Settings.mute AS mute, Lims_Settings.chatEnabled AS chatEnabled, Lims_Settings.adminAreaOpened AS adminAreaOpened FROM Lims_Settings ORDER BY Lims_Settings.sid
SELECT Lims_Panel.pid AS pid, Lims_Panel.userId AS userId, Lims_Panel.activePanelId AS activePanelId FROM Lims_Panel ORDER BY Lims_Panel.pid

SELECT Lims_Conversation.cid AS cid, Lims_Conversation.conversationId AS conversationId, Lims_Conversation.conversationType AS conversationType, Lims_Conversation.updatedAt AS updatedAt FROM Lims_Conversation ORDER BY Lims_Conversation.cid

SELECT Lims_Participant.pid AS pid, Lims_Participant.cid AS cid, Lims_Participant.participantId AS participantId, Lims_Participant.unreadMessagesCount AS unreadMessagesCount, Lims_Participant.isOpened AS isOpened, Lims_Participant.openedAt AS openedAt FROM Lims_Participant ORDER BY Lims_Participant.pid

SELECT Lims_Message.mid AS mid, Lims_Message.cid AS cid, Lims_Message.creatorId AS creatorId, Lims_Message.createdAt AS createdAt, Lims_Message.body AS body FROM Lims_Message ORDER BY Lims_Message.mid

SELECT Lims_Settings.sid AS sid, Lims_Settings.userId AS userId, Lims_Settings.presence AS presence, Lims_Settings.presenceUpdatedAt AS presenceUpdatedAt, Lims_Settings.mute AS mute, Lims_Settings.chatEnabled AS chatEnabled FROM Lims_Settings ORDER BY Lims_Settings.sid
SELECT Lims_Panel.pid AS pid, Lims_Panel.userId AS userId, Lims_Panel.activePanelId AS activePanelId FROM Lims_Panel ORDER BY Lims_Panel.pid

SELECT Lims_Conversation.cid AS cid, Lims_Conversation.conversationId AS conversationId, Lims_Conversation.conversationType AS conversationType, Lims_Conversation.updatedAt AS updatedAt FROM Lims_Conversation ORDER BY Lims_Conversation.cid

SELECT Lims_Participant.pid AS pid, Lims_Participant.cid AS cid, Lims_Participant.participantId AS participantId, Lims_Participant.unreadMessagesCount AS unreadMessagesCount, Lims_Participant.isOpened AS isOpened, Lims_Participant.openedAt AS openedAt FROM Lims_Participant ORDER BY Lims_Participant.pid

SELECT Lims_Message.mid AS mid, Lims_Message.cid AS cid, Lims_Message.creatorId AS creatorId, Lims_Message.createdAt AS createdAt, Lims_Message.body AS body FROM Lims_Message ORDER BY Lims_Message.mid

SELECT Lims_Settings.sid AS sid, Lims_Settings.userId AS userId, Lims_Settings.presence AS presence, Lims_Settings.mute AS mute, Lims_Settings.chatEnabled AS chatEnabled FROM Lims_Settings ORDER BY Lims_Settings.sid
SELECT Lims_Panel.pid AS pid, Lims_Panel.userId AS userId, Lims_Panel.activePanelId AS activePanelId FROM Lims_Panel ORDER BY Lims_Panel.pid

SELECT Lims_Conversation.cid AS cid, Lims_Conversation.conversationId AS conversationId, Lims_Conversation.conversationType AS conversationType, Lims_Conversation.updatedAt AS updatedAt FROM Lims_Conversation ORDER BY Lims_Conversation.cid

SELECT Lims_Participant.pid AS pid, Lims_Participant.cid AS cid, Lims_Participant.participantId AS participantId, Lims_Participant.unreadMessagesCount AS unreadMessagesCount, Lims_Participant.isOpened AS isOpened FROM Lims_Participant ORDER BY Lims_Participant.pid

SELECT Lims_Message.mid AS mid, Lims_Message.cid AS cid, Lims_Message.creatorId AS creatorId, Lims_Message.createdAt AS createdAt, Lims_Message.body AS body FROM Lims_Message ORDER BY Lims_Message.mid
SELECT Chat_Status.userId AS userId, Chat_Status.modifiedDate AS modifiedDate, Chat_Status.playSound AS playSound FROM Chat_Status ORDER BY Chat_Status.statusId

SELECT Chat_Entry.entryId AS entryId, Chat_Entry.fromUserId AS fromUserId, Chat_Entry.toUserId AS toUserId, Chat_Entry.createDate AS createDate, Chat_Entry.content AS content FROM Chat_Entry ORDER BY Chat_Entry.entryId
